title: Numeric study days in a week
userStory:
As a student

I would like to input the number of days I will study per week

So I can commit to my learning
acceptanceCriteria:
When I enter no numbers

A validation message should appear stating: 'A number of days is required'

When I enter less than 1 or greater than 7

Or I enter a non-numeric value

A validation message should appear stating: 'Please enter a number between 1 and 7'

When I enter between 1 and 7 inclusive

The number of study days is valid

partitions.exampleDescription: If a number is not entered, the validation will show the study days as invalid

partitions.description: Inputting 0 or less numbers is invalid
partitions.exampleDescription: If 0, -1, -2, - 3 and so on are entered, the validation will show the study days as invalid as they are below the minimum value

partitions.example: a, b, c, d, !, Â£, $ etc.
partitions.exampleDescription: If anything other than a number is added such as letters and special characters, the validation will show the study days as invalid as they are below the minimum value

partitions.description: Inputting numbers between 1 and 7 inclusive is valid
partitions.exampleDescription: if any of the following numbers: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 are entered, the study days will show as valid
If 8 or more is entered, the validation will show the study days as invalid as it is above the maximum number allowed

formControls.label: Study days
formControls.placeholder: Enter your number of study days

validations.message: A number of days is required
Please enter a number between 1 and 7
